longUrl.description: The long URL this short URL will redirect to

validSince.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) from which this short code will be valid

validUntil.description: The date (in ISO-8601 format) until which this short code will be valid

maxVisits.description: The maximum number of allowed visits for this short code

validateUrl.description: **[DEPRECATED]** Tells if the long URL should or should not be validated as a reachable URL. Defaults to `false`

tags.description: The list of tags to set to the short URL.

title.description: A descriptive title of the short URL.

crawlable.description: Tells if this URL will be included as 'Allow' in Shlink's robots.txt.

forwardQuery.description: Tells if the query params should be forwarded from the short URL to the long one, as explained in [the docs](https://shlink.io/documentation/some-features/#query-params-forwarding).
